ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • src/lib/Makefile.am: compile all files added...
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2008_06_26.shtml: new zmap release notes for 26 June 2008
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2008_06_26.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 26/06/2008
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.19894/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColBump.c: Fix for RT Ticket #71267 histogram column bumping removes baseline.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDNAChoose.c: Fix for RT Ticket #71964 Display the negative coords in reverse complemented state
  • src/zmapControl/: zmapControl.c, zmapControlViews.c, zmapControlWindow.c, zmapControlWindowInfoPanel.c, zmapControl_P.h: New Feature as requested in RT Ticket #69718 One Info Panel per View

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • w7/gff.c: back out a change I made too early.
  • w7/smapconvert.c: fix bug in clone field, back out coord change we are not ready for yet.
  • w6/smap.c: fix stupid bug of mine, incorrectly scaled reference sequence in gaps array.
  • w6/smap.c: fix a bug in root coord finding, not forcing length where key is the parent.
  • wnq/aceversion.c: fix version...I haven't been bumping the version on enough.
  • wnq/aceversion.c: new update level.
  • wnq/aceversion.c: undo version change to apply quick patch.
  • w7/smapconvert.c: remove parent setting in homol seg, messes up clustering.
  • wnq/aceversion.c: switch update back now patch done.
  • w1/freesubs.c, w2/graphcon.c, w9/blxmain.c, wh/version.h: fix annoying warning about version string not used.
  • w7/gff.c: fix long standing bug in reporting clone that homol is aligned to.
  • wh/smap.h: change smapstatus to enum, better for debugging. add clip coords to smapmapalign.
  • w6/smap_.h: add macros to test convType and strand.
  • w6/smap.c: Fix smapclipalign to clip to codons were required. Fix clipping of overall coords in smapmapalign. Fix coord bug in smapcomposemaps. fix bug in smapspan.
  • w7/smapconvert.c: change convertHomol() to use smapmapalign(), fix error handling, remove bad clone name.
  • wspec/models.wrm: add misalign tag which forces aligns to be mapped even if reference/match coords do not exactly align.
  • wh/iupac.h: fix annoying compiler meesages.
  • w2/gex.c, wh/gex.h: fix my own stupid bug in editor code, reworked to have a proper type and provide blocksing/non-blocking versions.
  • w6/treedisp.c: fix minor bug in moving around text + improve comments.
  • wtools/aceSetReleaseDir: keep version file in bin.XXX directory to stop builds trampling on each other.
